column4: I recently installed Ubuntu x64 10.04. The problem is that Ubuntu only recognises two out of my four cores on my CPU. It worked perfectly in 9.10 and on Windows.
well I just did a fresh install, so I guess it's pretty much the same?
AMD Phenom 2 x4 940, Gigabyte GA-MA790X-UD3P, 8 GB DDR2 Corsair, ATI HD4870 GPU
